item.title: Rob add a quote by AAA Predator Inc
item.description: "I prefer a man who will burn the flag and then wrap himself in the Constitution to a man who will burn the Constitution and then wrap himself in the flag." --Texas Representative Craig Washington, quoted in Molly Ivins' syndicated newspaper column, June 30, 1997 " -- AAA Predator Inc

item.title: Rob add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "Everything transitory is but an image." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Rob add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The most beautiful experience we can have is the mysterious - the fundamental emotion which stands at the cradle of true art and true science." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rob add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "A nation that continues year after year to spend more money on military defense than on programs of social uplift is approaching spiritual doom." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Rob add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "An individual who breaks a law that conscience tells him is unjust, and who willingly accepts the penalty of imprisonment in order to arouse the conscience of the community over its injustice, is in reality expressing the highest respect for the law" -- Martin Luther King Jr.
